name: Memories of a Lifetime
description:
Memories of a Lifetime makes you dive into the mind of Robert, a sixty-year-old man with amnesia, as a psychologist who wants to bring back his memory.

Discover and relive his unforgettable memories to help him uncover their new meaning through your choices.

Each of them will be decisive in transforming Robert's point of view of his life and the way he'll live the rest of it.

Subtitles and menus language : French only

Mouse

Game Designers : Théophile ANDRIEUX, Malo AYRAL, Jérémy BECICA, Yoan DELALONDE

Game Artists : Anaïa ARBIBE, Hugo DEMORAIS, Elsa CAMOUS, Marie CIAVAGLINI, Melany GIROU, Léa HINARD, Alice LI, Héléna MICHEL
